verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6767>shadowing<s%> with <S%H3671>wings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of Ethiopia: <S%H3568><s%>

That <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> <S%H6735>ambassadors<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even in <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H1573>bulrushes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> saying, <S%H1980>Go,<s%> ye <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H4900>scattered<s%> and <S%H4178>peeled,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> their <S%H1931>beginning<s%> <S%H1973>hitherto;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> meted <S%H6957>out<s%> <S%H6957><s%> and trodden <S%H4001>down,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> have <S%H958>spoiled!<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and <S%H7931>dwellers<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> ye, when he lifteth <S%H5375>up<s%> an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and when he <S%H8628>bloweth<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> ye.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, I will take my <S%H8252>rest,<s%> and I will <S%H5027>consider<s%> in my dwelling <S%H4349>place<s%> like a <S%H6703>clear<s%> <S%H2527>heat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H216>herbs,<s%> and like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> when the <S%H6525>bud<s%> is <S%H8552>perfect,<s%> and the sour <S%H1155>grape<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H1580>ripening<s%> in the <S%H5328>flower,<s%> he shall both cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2150>sprigs<s%> with pruning <S%H4211>hooks,<s%> and take <S%H5493>away<s%> and cut <S%H8456>down<s%> the <S%H5189>branches.<s%>

They shall be <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> unto the <S%H5861>fowls<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and the <S%H5861>fowls<s%> shall <S%H6972>summer<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H2778>winter<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> shall the <S%H7862>present<s%> be <S%H2986>brought<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4900>scattered<s%> and <S%H4178>peeled,<s%> and from a <S%H4480>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> their <S%H1931>beginning<s%> <S%H1973>hitherto;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> meted <S%H6957>out<s%> <S%H6957><s%> and trodden under <S%H4001>foot,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> have <S%H958>spoiled,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
